
# Spatial

`r rpt_content_description("spatial")`

```{r}
tbl_spatial <- get_spatial_tbl(
  d_spatial_tags, 
  aoi_wkt = sf_to_wkt(params$spatial_aoi_wkt)) %>% 
  mutate(
    `Rows in Results` = map_int(sp_data, nrow)) %>% 
  select(ID, Title, Tags, `Rows in Results`) # , sp_data)

datatable(
  tbl_spatial, 
  escape = F, rownames = F)
```
